channel.title: Acolyte[Cult Something]
channel.description:
This class cannot be created, it is a replacement for the cult's starting cultist, it would spawn alongside the cult leader
Name: Acolyte
Day Ability 1: Secrecy Your accusations today shall be hidden - 2 uses
Day Ability 2: Pass Note Whisper anonymously - 2 uses
Night Ability 1: Disguise Make another player appear as a specified class if they die - 3 uses
Night Ability 2: Retrain Make a Cult Player besides the Cult Leader into a different Cult Class - 1 use

item.title: Acolyte[Cult Something]
item.dc:creator: Magnasword2
item.description:
I love the idea of private accusations. It will make the Mercenary unsure whether to kill or not and create a new level of play.

Read full topic

item.title: Acolyte[Cult Something]
item.dc:creator: SoulShard
item.description:
one of the things cult gets is a chance to mislead the blue dragon for example if the max supports blue dragon gets are 2 and they get a priest and physcion when the support cult dies and physcion the priest will have a harder time being the 3rd support. things like this can mislead blue dragon something bluerose gets

this would remove this and its kinda op

Read full topic

item.title: Acolyte[Cult Something]
item.dc:creator: orangeandblack5
item.description:
The weird thing is that since every role is really OP by normal Mafia standards, we really have no basis for comparison as of yet.

Read full topic

item.title: Acolyte[Cult Something]
item.dc:creator: deadfrien
item.description:
While he can’t kill, his abilities are strong, and I think it’s a good concept.

He might need to be changed though.

Read full topic

item.title: Acolyte[Cult Something]
item.dc:creator: orangeandblack5
item.description:
I quite enjoy the idea of giving the Cult a new initial member.

Read full topic
